paragraphs.title: Word2Vec 모델 로드
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Word2VecModel

val model = Word2VecModel.load("nsmc/model/w2v")
val wordVec = model.getVectors

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Word2VecModel
model: org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Word2VecModel = w2v_35278f4db7ad
wordVec: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [word: string, vector: vector]

paragraphs.title: PCA로 차원 축소! 300차원 -> 2차원
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.PCA

val pca = new PCA()
    .setInputCol("vector")
    .setOutputCol("pca_vector")
    .setK(2)    // 2-dimension
    .fit(wordVec)

val pcaVec = pca.transform(wordVec)

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.PCA
pca: org.apache.spark.ml.feature.PCAModel = pca_fbafb0721c9c
pcaVec: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [word: string, vector: vector ... 1 more field]

paragraphs.title: 모든 word embedding을 2차원으로 축소하여 저장
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.ml.linalg.Vector

val vec2arr = udf { vector: Vector => vector.toArray }

val wordPoint = pcaVec.withColumn("pca_arr", vec2arr($"pca_vector"))
    .selectExpr("word", "pca_arr[0] AS x", "pca_arr[1] AS y")

wordPoint.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("nsmc/data/word_points.parquet")
wordPoint.createOrReplaceTempView("word_point")

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.ml.linalg.Vector
vec2arr: org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,ArrayType(DoubleType,false),Some(List(org.apache.spark.ml.linalg.VectorUDT@3bfc3ba7)))
wordPoint: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [word: string, x: double ... 1 more field]

paragraphs.title: 모든 단어의 유사 단어 50개씩 저장
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._

val NUM_SYNONYMS = 50
val findSyn = udf { word: String => model.findSynonymsArray(word, NUM_SYNONYMS) }

val synonym = wordVec.select("word")
    .withColumn("syn_sims", findSyn($"word"))
    .withColumn("syn_sim", explode($"syn_sims"))
    .selectExpr("word", "syn_sim._1 AS synonym", "syn_sim._2 AS similarity")
    .union(wordVec.selectExpr("word", "word AS synonym", "1.0"))

synonym.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("nsmc/data/synonyms.parquet")

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
NUM_SYNONYMS: Int = 50
findSyn: org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,ArrayType(StructType(StructField(_1,StringType,true), StructField(_2,DoubleType,false)),true),Some(List(StringType)))
synonym: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [word: string, synonym: string ... 1 more field]

paragraphs.title: 유사 단어 TOP 50 검색기
paragraphs.text:
%sql
WITH target_synonym (
    SELECT *
    FROM synonym
    WHERE word = '${Word}'
)
SELECT wp.x, wp.y, ts.similarity, ts.synonym AS word
FROM target_synonym ts
    JOIN word_point wp ON (ts.synonym = wp.word)
ORDER BY ts.similarity DESC

paragraphs.title: 벡터 연산 함수: A - B + C
남주, 여주, 남자, 여자의 word embeddings
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT *
FROM word_point
WHERE word IN ('여주', '남주', '여자', '남자')

paragraphs.title: 영화관, 유료, 티비, 무료의 word embeddings
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT *
FROM word_point
WHERE word IN ('영화관', '무료', '유료', '티비')
